stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Briefly describe one cause of United States involvement in the Second World War.

  2. Briefly explain how the United States economy from 1941 to 1960 was similar to the United States economy from 1920 to 1940.

  3. Briefly explain how the United States economy changed from 1941 to 1960 as a result of the Second World War.
